mapper.select: select inventory_id as inventoryId, inventory_name as inventroyName from inventory;

SELECT iim.inventory_id as inventoryId, ipm.item_id as itemId, iim.item_count as itemCount, ii.item_name as itemName, ii.item_code as itemCode, ii.item_unit as itemUnit, ii.item_unit_count as itemUnitCount, ii.item_icon as itemIcon, ii.item_qrbar_code as itemQrBarCode, ipm.mrp as mrp, ipm.cp as cp, ipm.sp as sp, iim.item_exp_id as itemExpId, ie.exp_dt as expDate, ipm.item_price_id as itemPriceId, now() > ie.exp_dt as expired, vim.item_count as vanItemCount, vim.van_id as vanId FROM inventory_item_map iim join item_price_map ipm on (iim.item_price_id = ipm.item_price_id and iim.inventory_id = #{inventoryId}) join item_info ii on (ipm.item_id = ii.item_id ) join item_exp ie on (ie.item_exp_id = iim.item_exp_id) left join van_item_map vim on vim.item_price_id = ipm.item_price_id ;

iim.inventory_id as inventoryId, ipm.item_id as itemId, iim.item_count as itemCount, ii.item_name as itemName, ii.item_code as itemCode, ii.item_unit as itemUnit, ii.item_unit_count as itemUnitCount, ii.item_icon as itemIcon, ii.item_qrbar_code as itemQrBarCode, ipm.mrp as mrp, ipm.cp as cp, ipm.sp as sp, iim.exp_dt as expDate, ipm.item_price_id as itemPriceId, iim.purchase_pending as purchasePending, iim.sale_pending as salePending, now() > ie.exp_dt as expired FROM inventory_item_map iim join item_price_map ipm on (iim.item_price_id = ipm.item_price_id and iim.inventory_id = #{inventoryId} and (iim.item_count > 0 or iim.exp_dt > date_sub(now(), interval 1 day))) join item_info ii on (ipm.item_id = ii.item_id and ii.item_name like #{searchText}) ;

SELECT vim.van_id as vanId, ipm.item_id as itemId, iim.item_count as itemCount, ii.item_name as itemName, ii.item_code as itemCode, ii.item_unit as itemUnit, ii.item_unit_count as itemUnitCount, ii.item_icon as itemIcon, ii.item_qrbar_code as itemQrBarCode, ipm.mrp as mrp, ipm.cp as cp, ipm.sp as sp, ie.exp_dt as expDate, ie.item_exp_id as itemExpId, ipm.item_price_id as itemPriceId, CASE WHEN pi.trans_type = 'PURCHASE' THEN pi.pending_count ELSE 0 END as purchasePending, CASE WHEN pi.trans_type = 'SALE' THEN pi.pending_count ELSE 0 END as salePending, invc_id as invoiceId, pi.transaction_status as transactionStatus, now() > ie.exp_dt as expired, ifnull(vim.item_count, 0) as vanItemCount, ifnull(iim.item_count, 0) as invItemCount, ifnull(iim.item_count, 0) - ifnull(vim.item_count, 0) as stockDiff FROM inventory_item_map iim join item_exp ie on (iim.item_exp_id = ie.item_exp_id and iim.inventory_id = #{inventoryId}) join item_price_map ipm on (iim.item_price_id = ipm.item_price_id) join item_info ii on (ipm.item_id = ii.item_id) left join van_item_map vim on (iim.item_price_id = vim.item_price_id and iim.item_exp_id = vim.item_exp_id and vim.van_id = #{vanId}) left join pending_item pi on (pi.van_inv_id = vim.van_id and pi.item_price_id = ipm.item_price_id and pi.item_exp_id=vim.item_exp_id);
